basics.name: Sabal K.C.
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Results-driven and highly motivated software engineer with a passion for tackling diverse challenges. Proven track record of exploring, learning, and mastering new tools and technologies to efficiently solve complex problems.

work.name: Dapi
work.position: Software Engineer - Backend and Web Scraping
work.summary: I am currently working as a backend and integration software engineer at Dapi, specializing in Golang and web scraping with NodeJS + puppeteer. Dapi is a Y Combinator-backed fintech company that makes payments simple. Dapi's mission is to build the financial technology infrastructure for the next generation of financial services. Dapi operates in the Middle East, USA, and LatAm.

work.name: Ibriz.AI
work.summary: I worked as a full-stack developer, primarily in the frontend with React. I was involved in the development and maintenance of multiple web3 projects, which included integration of wallets and smart contracts in Ethereum, ICON, Tezos blockchain.

work.name: Okhati solutions
work.summary: I gained experience with both frontend (React, Redux) and backend (Node, Express) in an EMR(Electronic medical record) software, used by clinics, labs & hospitals that also included patient-flow management, billing, accounting, reporting, bulk messaging and many other features.

courses: Software engineering, Operating system, Object oriented programming, Data structures and algorithms, AI, Mathematics
